titles.title: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Windsor Heights, Iowa.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia.

bill.summary:
1/29/2008--Introduced.
Directs the U.S. Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code that encompasses the entire city of Windsor Heights, Iowa.
